vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συγκᾰλέω,
future -καλέω[Refs 8th c.BC+], Attic dialect -καλῶ[Refs 5th c.BC+]
__1 call to council, convoke, convene, [Refs 8th c.BC+]:—middle, [NT+5th c.BC+]
__2 invite with others to a feast, σ. αὐτοῖς καὶ Ἀρτάβαζον [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (act.) to call together; (middle) to call to one’s side, summon
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(act.) to call together; (middle) to call to one’s side, summon
to call together, Mk. 15:16; Lk. 15:6, 9; Acts 5:21; middle to call around one's self, summon Lk. 9:1; 23:13; Acts 10:24; 28:17*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: llamar a reunión, convocar; (voz media) invitar, convocar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 召喚, 召集
2) 召來身邊
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 召唤, 召集
2) 召来身边
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: gọi với nhau; tập họp; triệu tập. σύν (G4862) + καλέω (G2564)
